p: Therefore, just like the fear response [ 20], or automatic/heuristic behaviors [ 21], and other systemic cognitive and emotional patterns, the instinctual response to stigma can bring to bias. These biases are naturally prerogative of the human being, but they can also be fertile ground for maladaptive and discriminatory behaviors. Lack of knowledge, or excessive instinct, are the main drivers of bias and discriminatory behaviors [ 21].
